column3: "it feels like it has been foooorever... luckily I have lucy to keep me company" *holds up stuffed bunny*
"No silly, my mom is going to be released today since she is feeling better. Its been so long im so excited to see her!"
"I dont think I have seen anything strange mister, but maybe Lucy has seen something" *holds up lucy*

"Really? Thats what your asking? I thought you were a detective? Apparently, I held you in too high regard. Why does anyone do anything? For the purpose of tugging at the chains of the world, and controlling its destiny for once!"
"I needed all those rituals to contact the aliens. So I could truly know the people who built the pyramids"
"Your going away for a long time considering what you did here"
"ZZZzzzzz"
""ZZZzzzzz
"Huh, leaving time already?"
"What can I say! I was so funny he Dropped Dead from laughter" *laughs historically*
"Whats so funny!? Whats so funny!? Let me tell you something life is funny, God's greatest joke" *laughs historically*
"Are you allowed to go past! Are you allowed to go past! Not really gaurding fort knox! If you reeeeaaally wanna go in there by alll means" *laughs historically*
"YUM"
"yeah? I'd like to see you clean up human remains"
"let me just tell you, for a janitor i clean up more dead bodies than a Diener"
"I mean you would need a special key, but no way in hell your gonna get it"
"UUuuuuh, I think something bad was in the cupcakes. Everyone else collapsed when they ate one. They must be poisoned, Uuuuuh, oh god i dont want to die!"
"UUuuuuh, Dr. kliener did, I should have known that crazy cheapscate didn't have any kindness in his heart! How could I have been so foolish"
"there should be something in the infarmary, Uuuuh, if it isn't looted it should be there.... HURRY!"
"I think you need advice. The best advice I can give you is to give me 100 bucks"
"I mean come on man, I don't stroll into people's lives and tell them what they should do. I mean who do think you are, acting so tough"
"there are many things that are weird about this place but I can't quite remember..."
"There were so many of them! I thought I was going to die! "
"no they used them all in the fight"
"Im gonna probably, wait until they are gone to leave"
